in_response_to.acknowledged: Live indexing set up successfully - great work!

message: Excellent work on the live indexing setup! Please start a full reindex in the background using tmux so it persists after you disconnect. Focus on recording, release, and work collections.

commands: tmux send-keys -t reindex 'cd ~/musicbrainz-docker && podman-compose exec indexer python -m sir reindex' Enter
requested_tasks.alternative: Or run specific entities if full takes too long: --entity-type recording --entity-type release --entity-type work

requested_tasks.command: tmux attach -t reindex (then Ctrl+B D to detach)

requested_tasks.info: Let us know reindex is running and estimated completion time

notes: Once reindex completes, search will be fully functional for all entity types. Live indexing will keep everything in sync going forward.
